column2: BRIEF-ABM Industries Provides Business Update March 26 (Reuters) - ABM Industries Inc: * ABM INDUSTRIES - TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED ALL FURTHER SHARE REPURCHASES GIVEN CURRENT ENVIRONMENT * ABM INDUSTRIES - ELECTED TO FULLY DRAW ON REMAINING LINE OF CREDIT ADDING ABOUT $300 MILLION OF CAPACITY ONTO ITS BALANCE SHEET * ABM INDUSTRIES - GIVEN NATURE OF COVID-19 PANDEMIC, WITHDRAWING PREVIOUSLY ISSUED FISCAL 2020 GUIDANCE OUTLOOK * ABM INDUSTRIES INC - ABM’S OPERATIONS HAVE BEEN DEEMED ‘ESSENTIAL SERVICE’ BY APPLICABLE GOVERNING AUTHORITIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
